https://jenkins.openbmc.org/job/ci-repository/96595/ : SUCCESS
Should the availability be set to true if the MCTP endpoint is successfully recovered?
It is already covered in the pre-patch set https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/pldm/+/73012/4/requester/mctp_endpoint_discovery.cpp#298

I see! Thanks!

When getting available false, sensorTask stops the sensorpolling timer, will it starts sensor polling again while receiving signal, or the sensor polling will not start again?

https://github.com/openbmc/pldm/blob/master/platform-mc/sensor_manager.cpp#L170-L176

https://github.com/openbmc/pldm/blob/master/platform-mc/sensor_manager.cpp#L116-L132

When the MCTP endpoint is recovered, the propertyChange signal will be triggered `propertiesChangedCb` and the callback will trigger this code
https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/pldm/+/73012/4/requester/mctp_endpoint_discovery.cpp#297
Then manager will call https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/pldm/+/73012/4/platform-mc/manager.hpp#86
Then sensorManager will start sensor polling timer again
https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/pldm/+/73012/4/platform-mc/manager.hpp#107

This patch set is the second patch set of the chain https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/pldm/+/73013/5 and https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/pldm/+/73012/4. So the patch set 73012 has to be review and merged first.

The `updateAvailableState()` brief says that the sensor stop polling flow will be executed while the `false` state. I think it will not start sensor polling again while the `ture` state. I do not find the restart sensor polling code also.
https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/pldm/+/73012/4/platform-mc/manager.hpp#99

The `getAvailableState()` is checked in `doSensorPollingTask`. However, the function is stopped due to the timer and it will not check the available state again.
https://github.com/openbmc/pldm/blob/master/platform-mc/sensor_manager.cpp#L170
https://github.com/openbmc/pldm/blob/master/platform-mc/sensor_manager.cpp#L187
https://github.com/openbmc/pldm/blob/master/platform-mc/sensor_manager.cpp#L259

The sensor polling Timer:
https://github.com/openbmc/pldm/blob/master/platform-mc/sensor_manager.cpp#L50-L63

I updated code of patch set https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/pldm/+/73012/5..6 to support start sensor polling again.
I also set all sensors of terminus which is not available for PLDM request to nan. Please check.
Thanks for your comments.

Thank you! 
We will try these patches and provide feedback.
